attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a simple petition for everyone who wants to sign it. I am making this petition for all the University students, in which drinking is a large social role of University life at the age of 18. This petition is for everyone who is in the Army and the RAF and the Navy, in which drinking is also a large role in their social life at the age of 18. This petition is for everyone who disagrees with the drinking age being raised to 21.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
